danish_publication: I Jebjærg hede gik der også en landmåler til visse tider i mange år, og han gik og råbte: "Hvor skal a sætt 'en, og hvor skal a sætt 'en?" Så var der en dreng, der hørte det, han sagde: "Sæt den, hvor du har taget den, i Fanden navn." — "Det svar skulde a have haft for mange år siden, så havde a været frelst."
english_publication: For many years at certain times, a land surveyor went again in Jebjærg heath. He went and shouted, "Where should I put one, and where should I put the other?" Then there was a boy who heard this and he said: "Put it where you took it, in the name of the devil!" -- "I should have gotten that answer many years ago, then I would have been saved."
